 2004-00492004-02-06,  PPC,  ,  , 
PrecisDesignation of CHARLES H. SIMPSON of Pointe Claire, Quebec, a full-time member of the Canadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board, to act as Chairperson during any absence or incapacity of the Chairperson or during a vacancy in the office of Chairperson.
